name: DF'16 Robotics Service Demo
description: IOT Cloud ingesting Robotics Fault data from a Heroku Connected App

robotID.description: We will generate a unique deviceID for you

iotToken.description: Bearer Token required by IOT Cloud to send messages

endpointURL.description: IOT Cloud Endpoint URL for ingestion

IRON_MQ_PROJECT_ID.description: Heroku IronMQ Project ID for return messages from IOT Cloud

IRON_MQ_TOKEN.description: Heroku IronMQ Token for return messages from IOT Cloud

queueURL.description: Heroku IronMQ Queue for return messages from IOT Cloud
